input.content: The year is 2022. I am at the National Air and Space Museum east of the Potomac River. I want to go to Fire Station 301 DCA ARFF using the metro. I go in the wrong direction and end up at the station closest to Cleveland Elementary School. How many metro stations am I away from my original destination if I don't change lines? Your answer should be a numerical integer value.

input.content: The year is 2022. I am at the National Air and Space Museum east of the Potomac River. I want to go to Fire Station 301 DCA ARFF using the metro. I go in the wrong direction and end up at the station closest to Cleveland Elementary School. How many metro stations am I away from my original destination if I don't change lines? Your answer should be a numerical integer value.

tools_called.tool_args: {"query": "In 2022, the National Air and Space Museum is near L'Enfant Plaza metro station. Fire Station 301 DCA ARFF is near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport metro station (Blue Line). A person takes the metro wrong direction from L'Enfant Plaza and ends up at the station closest to Cleveland Elementary School (2700 Minnesota Ave NE, DC), which is Minnesota Avenue station (Orange Line). How many metro stations is this person away from their original destination (Fire Station 301 DCA ARFF) if they don't change lines? Provide a numerical integer answer."}

input.content: The year is 2022. I am at the National Air and Space Museum east of the Potomac River. I want to go to Fire Station 301 DCA ARFF using the metro. I go in the wrong direction and end up at the station closest to Cleveland Elementary School. How many metro stations am I away from my original destination if I don't change lines? Your answer should be a numerical integer value.
